Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Free Worlds Leagueâ€™s Capture of Leyda and Villanueva Confirmed; Shiro III Finally Fallen Captain-General of the Free Worlds League (FWL), Duncan Marik, continues his offensive on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDuchyOfAndurien],Duchy of Andurien]], with the confirmed capture and pacification of the [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Leyda],Leyda]] system. The subsequent invasion of the [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Villanueva],Villanueva]] system was also reported as successful. Political pundits expected a quick follow-up, which indeed happened. [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Shiro],Shiro III]] was attacked soon after, with three [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikFWLM],FWLM]] regiments operating on the planet: Atrean Hussars, the 1st Marik Militia and the 1st Fusiliers of Oriente.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: What followed was brutal fighting between the [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikC8],Atrean Hussars]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDefendersOfAndurien],5th Defenders of Andurien]]. The Defenders managed to break the Marik lines but were prevented from achieving a total victory by the arrival of reinforcing [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikA2],1st Marik Militia]] and [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikA5],1st Fusiliers of Oriente]] formations. The 5th Defenders of Andurien disengaged and left the theater on their dropships. FWLM formations then attacked the capital city, defended by the entrenched [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDefendersOfAndurien],1st Defenders of Andurien]] regiment. Unlike the previous pitched fighting, Marik forces refused to launch a direct assault and instead opted to wear down the defenders. The Anduriens seemed to have decided that further defense was unlikely to produce a victory and retreated from the planet on June 7th. This has been the CNB June broadcast.
